item.description:
I've decided that my bike has been neglected.  This must not stand!


Join me for a bike ride on the East Bay bike path this Saturday, starting from Bristol, RI. This will be a bike path ride - no streets, no cars, no worries.


As uEast Bay Bike path usual, our speed on the bike path will be *significantly slower* than when we ride on roads. If it is raining - I will reschedule for another day. The East Bay bike path is 14.5 miles of paved bike path from Bristol to Providence. It's pretty flat except for a hill or two at the Providence side. Meet us at Colt State Park in Bristol, Rhode Island. We'll start from the parking lot across the street from the North Cemetery on Asylum Road.

PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE remember to take my cell phone number: 401-699-7304 in case you can't find us. As usual, I will be sporting my signature red road bike. I drive a red car.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red road bike. Try my cell: 401-699-7304.
item.name: Cycling - East Bay 29 miles, SLOW PACE
